name: Burning Horizon (SexyLegs11)
description:
The Burning Horizon Track is the deadliest strip of metal in the Galaxy. Beyond the reaches of Earth's laws is the greatest tournament in existence .  Come join in this epic race as you blast you way towards victory over your opponents.  Gather items and avoid danger as you traverse the alien world known as Eris 9. Live long enough and you may even earn the title of Grand Champion. 

Plug in your controller or grab your mouse because Burning Horizon is an intense 3rd person racing game that puts your driving and shooting skills to the test. Compete again and again until you join the S Ranked Racers.

Features:

  • Driver Ranking System
  • Beautiful Alien Environment
  • Surprise Traps
  • Pick-Up Items

Burning Horizon is a prototype that was created by a group of students. Come explore our fresh new world where there may be more places to discover later on. 

Big Thanks to the following programs:

  • Unreal Engine 4
  • 3ds Max
  • ZBrush
  • Substance Painter
  • Substance Alchemist
  • Photoshop
  • Spacescape
  • XNormal
